about_the_game:
UPDATED TO INCLUDE "THE STARLIGHT UPDATE CONTENT AND VISUAL REMAKES!


Explore 80 pages of exclusive concept art, early character sketches, and a behind-the-scenes look at the production process with the official "Love Spell: Written In The Stars" digital artbook!

Within the magical pages of this art book, a mesmerizing array of splendid art and magic awaits! Enriching the experience further, you'll discover captivating commentary and profound insights into the creative journey, generously shared by the developers and designers themselves.

Delve deeper with interviews featuring the development team and a delightful Q&A with the beloved cast, among many more visual goodies and surprises!

AFTER INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS:


After purchasing and installing the DLC, the PDF art book will be in the folder "Love Spell Digital Extras" under the root folder where Love Spell is installed.

For example, on Windows 10, this folder would typically be "C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Love Spell Written In The Stars".

If you are unsure where your Love Spell game is installed, navigate to Love Spell in the Steam library, right click and select "Properties...".
Switch to the "Local files" tab in the window that pops up and press the "Browse local files..." button to open the folder where Love Spell is installed.
